client.controllers

Class AdminSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.controllers.AdminSystem

  • public class AdminSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller class responsible for administration needs.

      • getDataBundle

        public DataBundle getDataBundle()

        Returns:

      • getUserViolateLimit

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getUserViolateLimit(java.lang.String threshold)
        Get the users that violate a threshold
        Parameters:
        threshold - can be "maxIncompleteTrade", "maxWeeklyTransaction", or "minLendBorrowDifference"
        Returns:
        a map containing the usernames as keys and the number they exceeded the limit as values

      • freezeUser

        public boolean freezeUser(java.lang.String username)
        Freeze the user with the username
        Parameters:
        username - freeze the user with the username
        Returns:
        true iff this user exists and frozen successfully.

      • unfreezeUser

        public boolean unfreezeUser(java.lang.String username)
        Unfreeze the user with the username
        Parameters:
        username - unfreeze the user with the username
        Returns:
        true iff this user exists and frozen successfully.

      • getRequests

        public java.util.Map<RequestType,java.util.Collection<Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>>> getRequests()
        Return a specific Map
        Returns:
        A Map with:  -keys being request types
         -values are collections of pairs whose:
          -keys are short string descriptions of the requests, used for displaying in a JList
          -values are long string descriptions of the requests, used for displaying in JDialog

      • getPassword

        public java.lang.String getPassword()
        Get the password of this admin
        Returns:
        the current password of this admin

      • setPassword

        public boolean setPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Set the password of this admin. Cannot set if password is not a valid string for passwords.
        Parameters:
        password - the password to set
        Returns:
        true iff set the password successfully.

      • getFormattedRevertersByUsername

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>>>> getFormattedRevertersByUsername()
        Get a specific map.
        Returns:
        A Map with:  -keys being usernames
         -values are maps whose:
          -keys are a short string descriptions of the reverter, used for displaying in JList
          -values are list of pairs whose:
           -value1 is a long string descriptions of the reverter, used for displaying in JDialog
           -value2 is an Object that must be passed as an argument to AdminSystem.undo

      • getFormattedRevertersByType

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>>>> getFormattedRevertersByType()
        Get a reverter by the username.
        Returns:
        A Map similar to that of AdminSystem.getFormattedRevertersByUsername

      • undo

        public java.lang.String undo(java.lang.Object reverter)
        Undo the action related to reverter.
        Parameters:
        reverter - ActionReverter used to undo an action.
        Returns:
        String message indicating whether the undo is successful or not.

      • searchByUsername

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> searchByUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Searches a User or Admin by using username. If username correspond to a User, include all trading information about this User.
        Parameters:
        username - possible username of a User.
        Returns:
        Map of short descriptions to long descriptions of the result entries. Short descriptions are displayed in a JList and long descriptions are displayed in a JDialog.

      • handleRequest

        public boolean handleRequest(RequestType type,
                             Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> request,
                             boolean accepted)
        Accepts or denies a request with type, request,and accepted.
        Parameters:
        type - request type.
        request - the actual request going to be accepted or denied.
        accepted - true if accept the request, false if deny the request.
        Returns:
        true if the request is handled successfully.
